devdoc.details: Storage for voting power is at this address, while execution is delegated to the prism proxy implementation contract All contracts that use voting power should reference this contract.

acceptProxyAdmin().details: Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin

acceptProxyImplementation().details: Admin function for new implementation to accept it's role as implementation

setPendingProxyAdmin(address).details: Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

setPendingProxyImplementation(address).details: Admin function for proposing new implementation contract

devdoc.title: VotingPowerPrism

NewAdmin(address,address).notice: Emitted when pendingAdmin is accepted, which means admin is updated

NewImplementation(address,address).notice: Emitted when pendingImplementation is accepted, which means implementation is updated

acceptProxyAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin

acceptProxyImplementation().notice: Accepts new implementation for prism. msg.sender must be pendingImplementation

constructor.notice: Construct a new Voting Power Prism Proxy

pendingProxyAdmin().notice: Get pending admin for prism proxy

proxyAdmin().notice: Get current admin for prism proxy

setPendingProxyAdmin(address).notice: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

setPendingProxyImplementation(address).notice: Create new pending implementation for prism. msg.sender must be admin
